bioghist.p: Czetong Thomas Song was the assistant director of the Bryn Mawr College Library from 1969 to 1986.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of office files from the Bryn Mawr College Library director's office. Records include annual and treasurer's reports from Bryn Mawr College; budgets; memoranda and minutes from various library committees; records related to Tri-College library cooperation and comparative statistics for college libraries; information on library catalog automation/computerization; materials related to the building of Canaday Library, including correspondence, architectural drawings, floor plans, and an inaugural brochure; computer program operating manual; bound volumes of Data Processing Magazine for 1966-1967; records of an EEOC lawsuit against Bryn Mawr College; an inventory of a collection of Chinese and Korean books held by the library; and miscellaneous books and administrative papers.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
